about_the_game:
In this demo version of Sexcalibur: Knights of the Pound Table you can experience the first two chapters of the game now compatible with Lovense devices to enhance your playing pleasure!

FEATURES

  • Translated version of the original Japanese Visual Novel

  • The female knights are fully voiced with original Japanese dialogue

  • Original artwork HD upscaled with 16:9 and 4:3 variants

  • Hours of story content

  • Audio including music and special effects

  • Enhanced with animated character sprites

  • Gallery and Scene selections

  • 2 H-Scenes supercharged with the special Lovense sauce!

content_descriptors.notes:
- Allusions to, and threats of violence. 
- Large portions of the game include nudity and graphic descriptions of sexual activities.
- Characters are blackmailed/coerced into performing sexual acts.
- Some scenes include characters engaging in non consensual sexual acts.

detailed_description:
In this demo version of Sexcalibur: Knights of the Pound Table you can experience the first two chapters of the game now compatible with Lovense devices to enhance your playing pleasure!

FEATURES

  • Translated version of the original Japanese Visual Novel

  • The female knights are fully voiced with original Japanese dialogue

  • Original artwork HD upscaled with 16:9 and 4:3 variants

  • Hours of story content

  • Audio including music and special effects

  • Enhanced with animated character sprites

  • Gallery and Scene selections

  • 2 H-Scenes supercharged with the special Lovense sauce!

fullgame.name: Sexcalibur: Knights of the Pound Table

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Sexcalibur: Knights of the Pound Table Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 or DirectX
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound
